name: lost in the woods (Ivanthecool1)
description:
This is a game in which you must find some things, get to a place, and totally bash up some gnoblins.

Arrow keys to move, approach gnoblins to initiate (dance) battle, combat is self explanatory (~ish), approach doohickeys to collect them, no surprises, (winkey winkey) flounder totaly in face of gnoblins in order to die.

~ made in PICO-8 in 2 days.
